name: Discrete Mathematics: Sets Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of sets in discrete mathematics.

questions.questionText: What is a set in discrete mathematics?
options: A collection of numbers or objects

questions.questionText: What is the cardinality of the set {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}?
What is the intersection of the sets {1, 2, 3} and {3, 4, 5}?

name: Discrete Mathematics: Relations Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of relations in discrete mathematics.

questions.questionText: What is a relation in discrete mathematics?
options: A function that maps one set to another

questions.questionText: What is the inverse of the relation {(1, 2), (3, 4)}?
What is the composition of the relations {(1, 2), (2, 3)} and {(3, 4), (4, 5)}?

name: Discrete Mathematics: Logic Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of logic in discrete mathematics.

questions.questionText: What is a proposition in discrete mathematics?
options: A collection of numbers or objects
A statement that is either true or false

questions.questionText: What is the truth value of the proposition 'If p then q' if p is false and q is true?
What is the negation of the proposition 'p and q'?
